TOrgGitLabPath.description: The GitLab group path for the organization (e.g., acme-group)

TOrgPackageSourceKey.description: The key name for the private Group NuGet feed (e.g., acme.com)

TOrgPackageSourceValue.description: The URL to the private Group NuGet feed (e.g., https://gitlab.com/api/v4/groups/111111111/-/packages/nuget/index.json)

TPlatformPulumiRepositoryName.description: The repository name for the Platform Pulumi project in pascal case (e.g., PlatformPulumi)

TPlatformPulumiAzureRepositoryName.description: The repository name for the Platform Pulumi Azure project in pascal case (e.g., PlatformPulumiAzure)

TIamEntraIdRepositoryName.description: The repository name for the IAM infrastructure in pascal case (e.g., IamEntraId)

TIamEntraIdRepositoryGitLabPath.description: The GitLab path for the repository (e.g., iam-entra-id)

TProjectPackageSourceValue.description: The URL to the private Project NuGet feed (e.g., https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/111111113/-/packages/nuget/index.json)

TIamAzureRepositoryName.description: The repository name for IAM Azure project in pascal case (e.g., IamAzure)

TIamAzureRepositoryGitLabPath.description: The GitLab path for IAM Azure repository (e.g., iam-azure)

TContainerizationRepositoryName.description: The repository name for Containerization project in pascal case (e.g., Containerization)

TContainerizationRepositoryGitLabPath.description: The GitLab path for Containerization repository (e.g., containerization)

TContainerizationDeploymentRepositoryGit.description: The GitLab path for ContainerizationDeployment repository (e.g., containerization-deployment)

TMicroserviceRepositoryName.description: The repository name for Microservice project in pascal case (e.g., Microservice)

TMicroserviceRepositoryGitLabPath.description: The GitLab path for Microservice repository (e.g., microservice)

TMicroserviceInfrastructureRepositoryGit.description: The GitLab path for MicroserviceInfrastructure repository (e.g., microservice-infrastructure)
